entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 19.
